actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the presentation of the patriotic production "America, O America, the Beautiful" to a joint meeting of the Congress during the Bicentennial year.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House and the President pro tempore of the Senate to make arrangements for the presentation of the multimedia production "America O America, the Beautiful", by Chaplain Robert E. Wall, to a joint meeting of the 94th Congress during the second session.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the presentation of the patriotic production "America, O America, the Beautiful" to a joint meeting of the Congress during the Bicentennial year.
